turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Yes, I would like to order a espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where would you like to order your coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. From which starbucks would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that the starbucks at starbucks at 23462 pax street?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. Is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you just repeat my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. A grande espresso with regular milk and whipped cream. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can you make that a caffè latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. Let me substitute that for a grande caffe latte with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. Your coffee will be ready for pickup at the starbucks at 23462 pax street shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. You will receive a text message with your receipt soon.
